attributes.action: Revoke the recognition of polygamous marriages in handing out state benefits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is an utter and outrageous abuse of tax payers money and contrary to the laws of Britain irrespective of whether the marriage took place overseas.  Treat everyone equally or not at all.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
